pages.text: A golden fork made of magnetic materials.$(br)Wait a second, gold isn't magnetic!$(br2)$(3)$(l)Special:$() Items and grist in a large radius around enemies will be given to you at the cost of 300 FE, you can also turn the fork off by shift-right clicking it.
Combine a Magnefork and a Battery in a Punch Designix.
Alternatively, combine Edison's Fury and a Magnet in a Totem Lathe.
Now turned off, it no longer consumes FE nor attracts things.
